hero_subtitle: Fintech platform, loyalty operator, and banking integrations — all in one technological stack.
tech_micro_desc: Node.js, Python, Go — scalable architecture for high load
tech_api_desc: Open interfaces with full OpenAPI documentation
tech_devops_desc: Prometheus, Sentry, automated tests and deployments
tech_scalability_desc: Flexible architecture for your business growth
business_payments_desc: Accept payments and tips in points/rubles through a unified system
business_fiscal_desc: Automatic data transmission for self-employed to tax authorities
business_white_label_desc: Own loyalty programs under your brand
business_hr_desc: Employee incentive systems through point programs
loyalty_aggregator_desc: Combine all customer point accruals in one system
loyalty_redemption_desc: Ability to exchange points between different programs
loyalty_sbp_desc: Convert points to rubles via Fast Payment System
loyalty_employee_desc: Reward systems for internal motivation programs
banking_agent_desc: Working via banking payment agent scheme (161-FZ)
banking_payments_desc: Full integration with national payment systems
banking_accounts_desc: Separate accounts for storing client funds
banking_ofd_desc: Integration with fiscal data operators and online cash registers
security_data_desc: All our clients' data is located within Russia
security_encryption_desc: Data protection at application and transport level
security_penetration_desc: Constant vulnerability checks and security testing
security_protection_desc: Protection against web attacks and distributed denial-of-service attacks
security_pci_desc: Compliance with international payment data security standards
docs_api_desc: Public portal with interactive Swagger documentation
docs_guides_desc: Step-by-step guides for quick platform connection
docs_sla_desc: Transparent service level agreements and availability guarantees
